channel.title: 2017 on DI Herbert Mühlburger

item.title: JavaScript Rising Stars 2017
item.description: I found an intersting article on the rising stars in the JavaScript world in 2017. There are the most important sections taken from the report. Most Popular Projects Overall Vue.js strikes again Once again, Vue.js is the trendiest project of the year, with more than 40,000 stars added on GitHub during the year. Front-end Frameworks The Big-3: Vue, React and Angular Without surprise, the 3 most popular UI frameworks are Vue.
